T02D1726:91b-1: au gra t'a ra de w'i s'a dh'a nam /
T02D1726:91b-3: lha mo au gra t'a ra'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1726:91b-4: shes rab gsal byed au gra t'a ra la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1726:91b-5: 'di nyid kyi bsgrub pa nyams su len par 'dod pa'i gang zag gis //
T02D1726:91b-9: khang stong la sogs pa'i gnas su /
T02D1726:91b-12: gnas gsum du rdo rje gsum bsam par bya zhing /
T02D1726:91b-14: srid pa gsum po thams cad snang bar byas /
T02D1726:91b-15: slar tshur 'dus nas thim par bsam mo //
T02D1726:91b-16: de nas stong pa nyid kyi don bsam zhing /
T02D1726:91b-17: aom sv'a bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a sv'a bh'a wa shuddhonyaham /
T02D1726:92a-0: de nas stong pa'i ngang las nam mkha'i gnas su a'a: @92a * //
T02D1726:92a-1: yig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po //
T02D1726:92a-2: de'i steng du t'am yig yongs su gyur pa las ka p'a la mtshan dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1726:92a-3: de'i steng du h'um yig sngon po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1726:92a-4: gri gug sngon po h'um gis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1726:92a-5: de yongs su gyur pa las rang nyid rje btsun
T02D1726:92a-6: ma au gra t'a ra nyid du gyur pa ni
T02D1726:92a-7: / sku mdog sngon mo 'jigs su rung ba /
T02D1726:92a-8: mi mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba dang ldan pa /
T02D1726:92a-9: zhabs g-yas bskum zhing g-yon brkyang pa /
T02D1726:92a-18: klu chen po brgyad kyis nyes bar brgyan pa /
T02D1726:92a-19: spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa /
T02D1726:92a-20: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D1726:92a-21: lang tsho gzhon sha dang ldan pa /
T02D1726:92a-22: phyag rgya lngas yang dag par brgyan pa /
T02D1726:92a-24: mche ba drag tu gtsigs pa /
T02D1726:92a-25: rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis gri sug dang /
T02D1726:92a-27: 'og ma gnyis kyis ral gri dang /
T02D1726:92a-29: dmar ser dang ldan pa'i ral pa gcig ma'i khrod
T02D1726:92a-30: na rigs kyi bdag po mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan
T02D1726:92a-31: par gyur pa'i lha mo'i skur bsam par bya'o //
T02D1726:92a-32: de ltar lha mo'i skur bsgom pa nyams su blangs
T02D1726:92a-33: pa nyid kyis sgrub pa po ni snyan dngags mkhan
T02D1726:92a-35: de nas bzlas par bya ste /
T02D1726:92a-37: ces pa snying ga'i gnas su 'od zer rnam pa lnga dang ldan par bsams nas /
T02D1726:92a-38: yi ge rnams kyi 'od zer lngas mi shes pa'i bud shing bsregs shing /
T02D1726:92a-39: ye shes kyi snang ba bskyed par bsam mo //
T02D1726:92a-40: g-yas ral gri'i gnas su mi rus kyi phreng ba 'chang bar mos la bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D1726:92a-41: de ltar 'di'i sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas ba tsam
T02D1726:92a-42: gyis 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi gsung gi dbang phyug thob
T02D1726:92a-43: par 'gyur ro // 'od zer spro bsdu'i sbyor ba
T02D1726:92a-44: nyid kyis yid rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag la
T02D1726:92a-45: par 'gyur ro // bsgom zhing / rang nyid snyan
T02D1726:92a-46: dngags mkhan chen po'i rig pa'i gnas lnga pa chen
T02D1726:92b-0: @92b po'i pandi ta yin snyam du nga rgyal bya'o
T02D1726:92b-1: par 'gyur ro // bsgom zhing / // de ltar
T02D1726:92b-2: bsgom pa la rtse gcig tu gnas pa nyid kyis
T02D1726:92b-3: the tshom med par snyan dngags mkhan chen po dang
T02D1726:92b-4: par 'gyur ro // bsgom zhing / // / gnas lnga pa'i pandi ta chen por 'gyur ro //
T02D1726:92b-7: a'a:las byung ba'i thod pa aom a'a:h'um las byung ba'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bsams la /
T02D1726:92b-8: sngags 'di nyid kyis gtor ma dbul lo //
T02D1726:92b-10: ma ma au pa n'i t'a ya /
T02D1726:92b-16: n'a g'a dhi pa ta ye /
T02D1726:92b-17: ai mam ba lim grihna grihna grihna pa ya grihna
T02D1726:92b-18: pa ya ba ra bi dy'a karsha ya karsha ya
T02D1726:92b-21: tstshe da ya tstshe da ya /
T02D1726:92b-23: zhes pa lan gsum mam bdun gyis so //
T02D1726:92b-25: h'um gi yi ge las byung sngo zhing spom thung ral pa'i thor tshugs ldan //
T02D1726:92b-26: g-yon brgyad mchog gis mi ro mnan cing mi bzad mchog gi gad rgyangs can //
T02D1726:92b-27: ral gri autpala dang ni gri gug thod 'dzin klu chen rgyan dang ldan //
T02D1726:92b-28: 'gro ba'i mi shes mun pa 'joms mdzad sgrol ma drag mo khyod la 'dud //
T02D1726:92b-30: gal te dngos dang rmi lam la sogs par 'byung po dang /
T02D1726:92b-31: sha za 'jigs su rung ba dang /
T02D1726:92b-32: bud med shin tu rid pa dang /
T02D1726:92b-33: sprul la sogs pas 'tshe ba dang /
T02D1726:92b-35: bsgrub snying mi 'dod pa rnams byung na gegs yin pas /
T02D1726:92b-36: 'di'i gtor sngags kyis gtor ma gtong zhing ;
T02D1726:92b-37: rje btsun lha mo'i rnal 'byor la yid brtan pas thams cad stong pa nyid du bsam zhing /
T02D1726:92b-39: bag tsha ba nyid du mi bya'o //
T02D1726:92b-40: de dag thams cad rang bzhin par 'gyur ro //
T02D1726:92b-41: sgrub pa po yid spro ba dang /
T02D1726:92b-43: bsgrub pa la blo brtan pa dang /
T02D1726:92b-46: rje mo la sogs pa'i bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang /
T02D1726:92b-47: lus sbom zhing brjid pa dang /
T02D1726:92b-48: dri ngad ldan pa la sogs pa'i bud med kyi
T02D1726:92b-49: chogs kyis phyag mtshan bu sti la sogs pa ster
T02D1726:92b-50: ba dang / rang gis rnyed pa dang /
T02D1726:93a-1: ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni grub pa'i rtags so //
T02D1726:93a-2: rjes su yi ge brgya pas nongs ba bshags shing /
T02D1726:93a-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D1726:93a-4: lha mo'i nga rgyal la gnas pas spyod lam thams cad yongs su bskyang bar bya'o //
T02D1726:93a-5: lha mo au gra t'a ra'i sgrub thabs rgya gar
T02D1726:93a-6: shar phyogs kyi pandi ta chen po shr'i ba na
T02D1726:93a-7: ras na'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1726:93a-9: // / pandi ta de nyid dang chos 'khor lo ts'a
T02D1726:93a-10: ba 'jam dpal ye shes zhes bya bas dpal 'khor
